entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Corner Brook
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:46 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -15.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Corner Brook 4:30 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
Temperature: -15.8°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.1 kPa rising
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -19.2°C
Wind: W 29 km/h gust 40 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Thursday 23 February 2023
